abstract: House Republicans pass legislation that gives states the power to regulate coal ash from power plants, preempting pending federal regulations that could be tougher.
snippet: House Republicans pushed through legislation on Friday that gives states the power to regulate coal ash from power plants, pre-empting pending federal regulations that could be tougher.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans pushed through legislation on Friday that gives states the power to regulate coal ash from power plants, pre-empting pending federal regulations that could be tougher.
